projects.name: Wealth SaGa

Supported Platform : Android
My Contribution    : built from scratch except AWS Deployment
Project Status     : Under Development

projects.name: In Memory Of You
achievements: A Social Media Platform to organize funeral Events

projects.name: Hostbidable
achievements: Hostbidable is an online property bidding platform where the property owner can sell their property to an appropriate buyer via auction hosted by some host
Tech Stack : Javascript,React Native, MongoDB, Express, NodeJS, Docker, AWS, Stripe Gateway, React Native Paper (for App UI), React Strap (for admin panel)
Supported Platform : Android and IOS
My Contribution : Application Frontend from scratch
Project Status     : Under Development

projects.name: Martcues
achievements: An E-commerce platform where users can buy all types of products including food items
Tech Stack : Javascript, React Native, MongoDB, Express, NodeJS, Docker, AWS, Rayzorpay Gateway, Ant Design (for admin panel), Winston
Supported Platform : Android
My Contribution : Mobile App Frontend from scratch
Project Status     : Under Development

projects.name: Ordio
achievements: A NextJS website with a support of internationalization
Tech Stack         : Javascript, React JS, Next JS, Bootstrap

projects.name: Recrugenie
achievements: MERN Stack Website similar to quikr, where users can book professionals like plumber, electrician etc.
Tech Stack : Javascript, React JS, Node JS, Express
Supported Platform : Web

Project Status     : Completed

projects.name: Fly High
achievements: An edTech Platform built using Ionic Framework where users can buy courses and take live classes backed by Agora APi
Tech Stack : Javascript, React JS, Node JS, Express, Agora Live Streaming Service, Rayzorpay Gateway, AWS, Material UI

My Contribution    : App Frontend and integration with Agora IO
Project Status     : Completed

wordExperience.companyDescription: Octify Technologies is a service based start-up.
responsibilities: Managing team as a Team Leader, ongoing projects as a Team Lead and handling clients
Designing, developing, and testing UI for mobile and web applications

some other responsibilities related to management
